papers.title: Characterizing the VPN Ecosystem in the Wild
papers.authors: Aniss Maghsoudlou, Lukas Vermeulen, Ingmar Poese, Oliver Gasser
papers.abstract: With the increase of remote working during and after the COVID-19 pandemic, the use of Virtual Private Networks (VPNs) around the world has nearly doubled. Therefore, measuring the traffic and security aspects of the VPN ecosystem is more important now than ever. VPN users rely on the security of VPN solutions, to protect private and corporate communication. Thus a good understanding of the security state of VPN servers is crucial. Moreover, properly detecting and characterizing VPN traffic remains challenging, since some VPN protocols use the same port number as web traffic and port-based traffic classification will not help. In this paper, we aim at detecting and characterizing VPN servers in the wild, which facilitates detecting the VPN traffic. To this end, we perform Internet-wide active measurements to find VPN servers in the wild, and analyze their cryptographic certificates, vulnerabilities, locations, and fingerprints. We find 9.8M VPN servers distributed around the world using OpenVPN, SSTP, PPTP, and IPsec, and analyze their vulnerability. We find SSTP to be the most vulnerable protocol with more than 90% of detected servers being vulnerable to TLS downgrade attacks. Out of all the servers that respond to our VPN probes, 2% also respond to HTTP probes and therefore are classified as Web servers. Finally, we use our list of VPN servers to identify VPN traffic in a large European ISP and observe that 2.6% of all traffic is related to these VPN servers. © 2023, The Author(s), under exclusive license to Springer Nature Switzerland AG.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着新冠肺炎疫情期间和之后远程工作的增加，虚拟专用网络(VPN)在全世界的使用几乎翻了一番。因此，测量VPN生态系统的流量和安全性比以往任何时候都更加重要。VPN用户依靠VPN解决方案的安全性来保护私人和公司通信。因此，很好地理解VPN服务器的安全状态是至关重要的。此外，正确检测和描述VPN流量仍然具有挑战性，因为一些VPN协议使用与web流量相同的端口号，基于端口的流量分类将无济于事。在本文中，我们的目标是检测和描述VPN服务器在野外，这有助于检测VPN流量。为此，我们在互联网范围内执行主动测量，以在野外找到VPN服务器，并分析它们的加密证书、漏洞、位置和指纹。我们找到了分布在世界各地的980万台使用OpenVPN、SSTP、PPTP和IPsec的VPN服务器，并分析了它们的漏洞。我们发现SSTP是最易受攻击的协议，超过90%的检测到的服务器容易受到TLS降级攻击。在所有响应我们的VPN探测的服务器中，有2%也响应HTTP探测，因此被归类为Web服务器。最后，我们使用我们的VPN服务器列表来识别一家大型欧洲ISP的VPN流量，并观察到所有流量中有2.6%与这些VPN服务器相关。2023，作者，独家授权给Springer Nature Switzerland AG。
papers.title_zh: 在野外描述VPN生态系统的特征

papers.title: How Ready is DNS for an IPv6-Only World?
papers.authors: Florian Streibelt, Patrick Sattler, Franziska Lichtblau, Carlos Hernandez Gañán, Anja Feldmann, Oliver Gasser, Tobias Fiebig
papers.abstract: DNS is one of the core building blocks of the Internet. In this paper, we investigate DNS resolution in a strict IPv6-only scenario and find that a substantial fraction of zones cannot be resolved. We point out, that the presence of an AAAA resource record for a zone's nameserver does not necessarily imply that it is resolvable in an IPv6-only environment since the full DNS delegation chain must resolve via IPv6 as well. Hence, in an IPv6-only setting zones may experience an effect similar to what is commonly referred to as lame delegation. Our longitudinal study shows that the continuing centralization of the Internet has a large impact on IPv6 readiness, i.e., a small number of large DNS providers has, and still can, influence IPv6 readiness for a large number of zones. A single operator that enabled IPv6 DNS resolution -- by adding IPv6 glue records -- was responsible for around 20.3% of all zones in our dataset not resolving over IPv6 until January 2017. Even today, 10% of DNS operators are responsible for more than 97.5% of all zones that do not resolve using IPv6.
papers.abstract_zh: DNS是互联网的核心构件之一。在本文中，我们研究了严格的纯IPv6场景中的DNS解析，发现有很大一部分区域无法解析。我们指出，区域名称服务器的AAAA资源记录的存在并不一定意味着它在仅支持IPv6的环境中是可解析的，因为完整的DNS授权链也必须通过IPv6进行解析。因此，在仅支持IPv6的设置中，区域可能会经历类似于通常所说的lame委派的效果。我们的纵向研究表明，互联网的持续集中化对IPv6的就绪性有很大影响，即少数大型DNS提供商已经并将继续影响大量区域的IPv6就绪性。在2017年1月之前，我们数据集中约20.3%的区域没有通过IPv6进行解析，而启用IPv6 DNS解析(通过添加IPv6粘合记录)的一家运营商对此负有责任。即使在今天，10%的DNS运营商负责97.5%以上不使用IPv6解析的区域。
papers.title_zh: DNS为纯IPv6的世界做好准备了吗？

papers.title: Exploring the Cookieverse: A Multi-Perspective Analysis of Web Cookies
papers.authors: Ali Rasaii, Shivani Singh, Devashish Gosain, Oliver Gasser
papers.abstract: Web cookies have been the subject of many research studies over the last few years. However, most existing research does not consider multiple crucial perspectives that can influence the cookie landscape, such as the client's location, the impact of cookie banner interaction, and from which operating system a website is being visited. In this paper, we conduct a comprehensive measurement study to analyze the cookie landscape for Tranco top-10k websites from different geographic locations and analyze multiple different perspectives. One important factor which influences cookies is the use of cookie banners. We develop a tool, BannerClick, to automatically detect, accept, and reject cookie banners with an accuracy of 99%, 97%, and 87%, respectively. We find banners to be 56% more prevalent when visiting websites from within the EU region. Moreover, we analyze the effect of banner interaction on different types of cookies (i.e., first-party, third-party, and tracking). For instance, we observe that websites send, on average, 5.5x more third-party cookies after clicking ``accept'', underlining that it is critical to interact with banners when performing Web measurements. Additionally, we analyze statistical consistency, evaluate the widespread deployment of consent management platforms, compare landing to inner pages, and assess the impact of visiting a website on a desktop compared to a mobile phone. Our study highlights that all of these factors substantially impact the cookie landscape, and thus a multi-perspective approach should be taken when performing Web measurement studies.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的几年里，网络cookies已经成为许多研究的主题。然而，大多数现有的研究没有考虑可能影响cookie前景的多个关键角度，如客户端的位置、cookie横幅交互的影响以及网站是从哪个操作系统访问的。在本文中，我们进行了全面的测量研究，从不同的地理位置和多个不同的角度分析了Tranco top-10k网站的cookie情况。影响cookie的一个重要因素是cookie横幅的使用。我们开发了一个工具BannerClick，可以自动检测、接受和拒绝cookie横幅，准确率分别为99%、97%和87%。我们发现，在访问欧盟地区的网站时，横幅广告的出现率要高出56%。此外，我们分析了横幅互动对不同类型的cookies(即第一方、第三方和跟踪)的影响。例如，我们观察到，网站在点击“接受”后发送的第三方cookies平均多5.5倍，这强调了在执行网络测量时与横幅互动的重要性。此外，我们分析了统计一致性，评估了同意管理平台的广泛部署，比较了登陆和内页，并评估了在桌面上访问网站与在移动电话上访问相比的影响。我们的研究强调，所有这些因素都极大地影响着cookie的前景，因此在进行Web测量研究时应该采取多视角的方法。
papers.title_zh: 探索Cookieverse:网络Cookies的多视角分析

papers.title: Quantifying User Password Exposure to Third-Party CDNs
papers.authors: Rui Xin, Shihan Lin, Xiaowei Yang
papers.abstract: Web services commonly employ Content Distribution Networks (CDNs) for performance and security. As web traffic is becoming 100% HTTPS, more and more websites allow CDNs to terminate their HTTPS connections. This practice may expose a website's user sensitive information such as a user's login password to a third-party CDN. In this paper, we measure and quantify the extent of user password exposure to third-party CDNs. We find that among Alexa top 50K websites, at least 12,451 of them use CDNs and contain user login entrances. Among those websites, 33% of them expose users' passwords to the CDNs, and a popular CDN may observe passwords from more than 40% of its customers. This result suggests that if a CDN infrastructure has a vulnerability or an insider attack, many users' accounts will be at risk. If we assume the attacker is a passive eavesdropper, a website can avoid this vulnerability by encrypting users' passwords in HTTPS connections. Our measurement shows that less than 17% of the websites adopt this countermeasure.
papers.abstract_zh: Web服务通常采用内容分发网络(cdn)来提高性能和安全性。随着网络流量成为100% HTTPS，越来越多的网站允许cdn终止其HTTPS连接。这种做法可能会将网站的用户敏感信息(如用户的登录密码)暴露给第三方CDN。在本文中，我们测量并量化了用户密码暴露于第三方cdn的程度。我们发现，在Alexa top 50K网站中，至少有12451个网站使用cdn，并包含用户登录入口。在这些网站中，33%的网站将用户的密码暴露给CDN，一个受欢迎的CDN可能会观察到超过40%的客户的密码。这一结果表明，如果CDN基础设施存在漏洞或内部攻击，许多用户的帐户将面临风险。如果我们假设攻击者是被动窃听者，网站可以通过在HTTPS连接中加密用户密码来避免这一漏洞。我们的测量显示，只有不到17%的网站采用这种对策。
papers.title_zh: 量化暴露给第三方cdn的用户密码
